name: Granchio al burro sospetto
desc: A grilled crab dish. The crab legs are still cold, and have a raw, salty flavor to them, almost as if one were being force-fed some seawater.

value.text: Increases all party members' DEF by 215 and healing effects by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Ricetta: granchio al burro
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Butter Crab.

value.name: Burro
value.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

value.name: Granchio
value.desc: Un crostaceo che vive accanto all'oceano. La sua deliziosa carne friabile pu√≤ essere utilizzata per preparare dei piatti appetitosi.

value.name: Alga
value.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

value.name: Matsutake
value.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

value.name: Granchio al burro delizioso
value.desc: A grilled crab dish. The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the tastes buds so seductively that before you know it, you've eaten it all, and are left sipping at the dregs of butter in the crab's shell, hoping to recapture a fragment of the dish's beauty.

value.name: Granchio al burro
value.desc: A grilled crab dish. Appropriate heat control has allowed the crab meat to stay moist and fatty. The butter has seeped into the crab meat, producing an aroma that has people salivating even from afar.
